name: Fractal (itch) (Eguin, Ellyh2, Pendington)
description:
Sensitivity is off on the WebGl version! To get the full experience please download the windows version. Have fun!

Use light as a weapon against oncoming enemies! Stemming from only 1 source of light, use it quickly it kill off enemies before they kill you!

The gameplay revolves around you rotating lights to destroy enemies as they come towards you, the longer you survive the better score!

Play in the web browser or download the game to keep your high score.

Credit:

For the font used the in the whole game: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059

Art, music, and 3D models: https://itch.io/profile/pendington

Game creation and UI: https://itch.io/profile/ellyh2

And to everyone on the Dev Atlas discord who helped me with any questions I had!
